name: uwularpy
description: A Next.js application that uwuifies markdown files in GitHub repositories when mentioned in issue comments

scripts.build: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && cargo install uwuify --version 0.2.2 && next build
